tool_description: Endpoints to transform texts into emojis, chatbot AI, coding assistant and translate. All powered by GPT.
name: Texts Magic - API
title: Texts Magic - API

api_list.name: /chat4
api_list.description: A chatbot AI that helps with anything. Powered by GPT-4.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://texts-magic-api.p.rapidapi.com/chat4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "texts-magic-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /text-to-emoji
